title: Type - Interest Rate
description: Type representation of an interest rate, including accrual start and end dates

rate.description: Interest rate for the convertible (decimal representation - e.g. 0.125 for 12.5%)

accrual_start_date.description: Commencement date for interest accruing at the specified rate

accrual_end_date.description: Optional end date (inclusive) for interest accruing at the specified rate. If none specified, interest will accrue indefinitely or until accrual of next interest rate commences
